snippet.title: This is your life now
snippet.description:
Release trailer for This is your life now, a game created in 48 hours by Renaud Forestié for Ludum Dare #44.

Live an entire life in 5 minutes or so.
Make difficult choices, and suffer their consequences.

From baby to old person, you’ll get to live something unique, and maybe you’ll find the meaning of life.

This is your life now.

Play the game for free at https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/this-is-your-life-now
